title: Ryder Cup 2025: day two – live
summary: Europe is looking to solidify their lead on day two at Bethpage Black. Live updates provide hole-by-hole coverage of the event. Follow our writers for the latest developments in the competition.

title: Hampshire in relegation peril after Surrey defeat, Yorkshire v Durham: county cricket final day – live
summary: James Wallace will provide live updates on the closing day of the season's final round. Stay tuned for the latest developments and highlights. Don't miss the excitement as the season concludes!

title: Brentford v Manchester United: Premier League – live
summary: Ruben Amorim's team aims to secure a second consecutive victory in a match taking place in west London. Barry Glendenning provides a minute-by-minute report on the game. Stay tuned for updates on the unfolding action.

title: Potter sacked, Brentford v Manchester United buildup, Madrid derby – matchday live
summary: Ruben Amorim seeks a much-needed victory as the football schedule heats up. The focus also shifts to the exciting Madrid derby on the horizon. Join the discussion on these key developments in the sport.

title: Trump’s attack on George Soros is the next step in the autocrat’s handbook | Kenneth Roth
summary: The president has escalated his campaign against dissent by targeting civilians, following previous attacks on judges, lawyers, media companies, and universities. This move signals a troubling trend towards silencing opposition and curbing freedom of expression. Concerns grow over the implications for civil rights and democratic norms in the country.
